abstract: Cisco Systems acquisition strategy hasn’t quite paid off for shareholders recently, Breakingviews says.
snippet: Cisco Systems acquisition strategy hasn’t quite paid off for shareholders recently, Breakingviews says.
lead_paragraph: John T. Chambers, chief executive of the networking giant Cisco Systems, is keeping the acquisition machine humming. The company’s $2.9 billion deal for Starent Networks is the second of roughly that size in October alone. And he has promised that more deals are coming. It’s too bad this strategy hasn’t quite paid off for shareholders recently, Breakingviews says.
